text: West Siberian Railway - one of the 16 branches of the OJSC " Russian Railways ". It is part of the Trans-Siberian Railway . == Road history == The road was built in the period 1892-1896 at the expense of the treasury. In 1900 it became part of the Trans-Siberian Railway. == Road characteristic == The expanded length of the main routes of the highway is 8,985.6 km. Three tunnels were erected on the road. == References == Category:Novosibirsk Category:Rail transport in Asia
title: West Siberian Railway
